TAP::Formatter::File(3pm) Perl Programmers Reference Guide TAP::Formatter::File(3pm)

NAME

TAP::Formatter::File - Harness output delegate for file output

VERSION

Version 3.42

DESCRIPTION

This provides file orientated output formatting for TAP::Harness.

SYNOPSIS

 use TAP::Formatter::File;
 my $harness = TAP::Formatter::File->new( \%args );

"open_test"

See TAP::Formatter::Base
